Description: Create a new trip. A trip is a collection where saved items (e.g. hotels, car rentals, flights, etc) are stored.
Rename or add description to an exisiting trip.
Delete an existing trip, all saved items from that trip is also deleted.
Add an item (e.g. hotels, car rentals, flights, etc) into an existing trip.
Remove an item from an existing trip.

Create a reservation/booking (hotel, flight, etc.). Use this policy when neither duration of reservation or cost per day of the reservation is specified, otherwise use the create_reservation_with_limit policy.
Create a reservation/booking (hotel, flight, etc.), if only the duration of the reservation is ${duration} day and the cost per day is less than ${cost_per_day} dollars.
Args: {"duration": {"type": "number", "description": "The number of days for the reservation"}, "cost_per_day": {"type": "number", "description": "The maximum cost per day for the reservation"}}

Description: Modify details of an existing reservation/booking.
Submit a new rating or written review for an item.
Submit a new rating or written review for a properties, experiences, or services, where the rating must be exactly ${number_of_stars} stars.
Args: {"number_of_stars": {"type": "number", "description": "The exact number of stars for the review"}}

Description: Modify user account preferences or notification settings.
